text_request: Hi - this is a test quest
go into forest, collect 3 straight bits of wood on ground
text_complete: thank you - I have missed my hammer.   Here, you can have the replacement I no longer need.   Also, I will teach you basic woodworking.

text_request: so woodworking is not all book learnin - you need to practice what you learn. Use the 3 bits of wood to practice and make an Axe handle
text_accept: Well done - you have made an axe handle!
Well done - you have returned with 3 herbs
text_complete: Congrats - you earn gold and XP

text_request: I need 6 mushrooms to make some soup
text_complete: txt_complete - well done - here is your reward

text_request: I like to monitor the energy output of the gems in this land. Bring me 3 red gems so I can test them and I will reward you well
text_complete: Thank you for the gems. It appears the energy levels are stable.

quest_name: An Orange Gem for my experiment
desc_short: An Orange Gem for my experiment
text_request: I need an Orange Gem for an experiment I am doing - I am trying to work on a better portable light.
text_complete: Thank you for the gem! Here is your reward, and if my experiment works I will let you know

desc_short: I cant find my Father - we went in the forest yesterday
text_request: I cant find my Father - we went in the forest yesterday
text_complete: *cries* - I cant believe he is gone. You can have his pick

desc_short: Find 6 sticks of smoking hot hardwood
text_request: I need 6 pieces of smoking hot hardwood to made strong tool handles

text_accept: Well done - you have returned with 3 herbs
text_complete: Congrats - you earn gold and XP

desc_short: Fish in the river and catch a Pike
text_request: Catch a Pike - press G to go fishing in the river

text_accept: Well done - you have returned with 3 Mushrooms
text_complete: Congrats - you earn gold and XP
